name: Inquisition (itch) (Benjamin Metaut)
description:
---CONTROLS---

  • WASD or DPAD for movement
  • ENTER to start
  • MAJ to select ( some secret )
  • Z / J = A button (Hit your hammer down !)
  • X / K = B button (Launch your spell : Wrath of light)

My second GB game developed in C with GBDK library ! 

This time to challenge more myself with the library with a game designed by me. 

The goal is simple : You play a paladin that have to protect a village against raiders ! You have to stand as long as you can ! Don't let pass more than 10 raiders 

( Select button have some surprise in the menu screen ;) and also in game )
